title: Up your game with Corsair Black Friday deals on keyboards, mice and headsets
author: john-loeffler
summary: Corsair Black Friday deals for the win!
article: When it comes to the best Black Friday PC gaming deals, peripherals are always big sellers, so it's no surprise that Corsair Black Friday deals are popping up at major retailers from Amazon to Best Buy.

With Black Friday deals rolling out at full tilt, most of the Corsair Black Friday deals we're seeing are probably about as good as they're going to get on a lot of these items, so if you see something you want, don't hesitate to jump on it.
(Not in the US? Scroll down for deals in your region).

No matter where you live, you'll find all the lowest prices for the best gaming keyboards, best gaming mice, and best gaming headsets from around the web right here, with offers available in your region.

headers.3: More gaming keyboard, mouse, and headset deals
